item.title: Jane Theme Preview
item.description:
我的朋友你好吗？

First level heading

This is a paragraph with a bold word and an italicized word.

Figure 1. Image caption

This is another paragraph.[1]

Second level heading

Unordered list title

  • list item 1

    • nested list item

      • nested nested list item 1

      • nested nested list item 2

  • list item 2

This is a paragraph.

Example 1. Example block title

Content in an example block is subject to normal substitutions.

item.title: Code and Table Example
item.description:
Code and Table Example

This post demonstrates how to write code and tables in Hugo.

Code Snippets

Here is a simple code snippet in Python:

def fibonacci(n):
 a, b = 0, 1
 for _ in range(n):
 print(a)
 a, b = b, a + b

item.title: KaTeX Example
item.description:
KaTeX Example Post

This post demonstrates how to write mathematical expressions using KaTeX in Hugo.

Inline Math

This is an inline equation: ( E = mc^2 )

Display Math

This is a block equation:

$$ \int_0^1 x^2,dx = \frac{1}{3} $$

Matrices

Here is how to render a matrix using KaTeX:

$$ \begin{bmatrix} a & b \ c & d \end{bmatrix} $$

item.title: List and Quote Example
item.description:
List and Quote Example

This post demonstrates how to write lists and blockquotes in Hugo.

Ordered List

  1. First item
  2. Second item
  3. Third item

Unordered List

  • First bullet
  • Second bullet
  • Third bullet

Blockquote

Here is a blockquote:

“The best way to predict the future is to invent it.” – Alan Kay

item.title: 数学示例
item.description:
数学表达式

这是一个数学块：

$$ \varphi = 1 + \frac{1}{1 + \frac{1}{1 + \frac{1}{1 + \cdots}}} $$

您还可以写入行内数学，例如：( E = mc^2 )。

item.title: Second Post
item.description:
Second Post

This is my second post. In this post, I’ll demonstrate how easy it is to write content using Markdown with Hugo.

Markdown Syntax

You can use bold text, italic text, and inline code. You can also create lists:

  • Item 1
  • Item 2
  • Item 3

Or numbered lists:

  1. Step one
  2. Step two
  3. Step three

item.title: First Post
item.description:
First Post

Welcome to my first blog post on this Hugo site! Hugo is a powerful static site generator that allows you to build fast, modern websites with ease.

Here are some highlights of Hugo:

  • Fast build times
  • Flexible templates
  • Great for blogs and documentation
